Description:
This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat adoption in Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook for users without Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. It enhances the Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat report by providing metrics on the number of active users of Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook and the last activity date for each user.
GA date: April CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Add Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook usage for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat usage report
